nodes.text: Yavin 22 was an uninhabitable moon of the gas giant Yavin Prime, originally an asteroid captured by the planet's gravity. The wreck of the space station Yavin Station could be found there. Suz Tanwa found Yavin Station where her ancestor, Suvam Tan, worked and lived there. The climate was dry and cold with gravity at a standard of 0.15. There was no government, nor any major exports or imports.
